Description.Name: SRM Ammo (Half)
Description.Details: This multirole ammo bin will be loaded with Streak SRM or Standard SRM as required by your mech design. It takes up the same space as a standard bin, but will only be loaded with half the standard amount of missiles. Good when weight is a concern. Ammo Bins will explode and damage their installed location when they receive a Critical Hit. SRM ammo bins contain 50 rounds of ammunition per ton. Explosion damage per ammo: 0.25
